about_the_game:
Welcome In Hell!


Turn-based horror strategy game with RPG elements where the action takes place in hell, player take lead one of 8 demonic races that each of them represents one of 7 Deadly Sins (the 8th sin is Acedia).

Inspiration for this universe are from creations of Hieronymus Bosch, Zdzisław Beksiński and American McGee.

Story

For long time Plains of Sins was ruled by pride Queen, but when she got killed in a mysterious way, each one of her ministers decides to become a new ruler and bring a New Hell Order!

Features
In this demo, you can play solo or with friends on hot-seat mode playing one of 4 available races in the demo.

Demo contains all gameplay mechanics, except campaigning and a map editor (and incoming online multiplayer).

Long Time Support Project


It's a fairly large project for one person, but I also want to expand it adding new mechanics and increasing the level of evilness.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: grotesque or creepy looks of the location and characters will be increased with each update.
